name: Rocket Sword Prototype
description:
untitled rocket sword prototype

if the web player is laggy just download the executable!!!!!!!! im not responsible for godot being weird lol

all sounds are placeholder

Controls:

  • Mouse: aim
  • LMB/Space: boost
  • RMB/Shift (hold): slice
  • MMB/Q/Tab: toggle lock-on 
  • Alt+Enter/F11: fullscreen
  • Esc: pause
  • page up/page down: adjust physics/rendering FPS to common values* 
*starts at 60fps, goes up to 144 then 240 then unlocked (experimental), also goes down from 60 to 30, then 20
